launchers package¶

Submodules¶

launchers.dss module¶

Created on 04/10/2013

@author: jcaineta

class launchers.dss.DssEnvironment(dss_path, par_path, output='dssim.out', simnum=0)[source]¶

Bases: object

Handle the environment to run DSS old version, where the parameters file path is hard coded as DSSim.PAR.

Methods

new() Create a new directory and copy EXE and PAR files into it.
purge() Remove all files and directories created for the environment.
reset_par_path() Restore the original parameter file path.
new()[source]¶

Create a new directory and copy EXE and PAR files into it.

purge()[source]¶

Remove all files and directories created for the environment.

reset_par_path()[source]¶

Restore the original parameter file path.

launchers.dss.execute(command)[source]¶
launchers.dss.mp_exec(dss_path, par_path, output, simnum, stop=None, dbg=None, print_dss_status=False, cores=None, print_mp_status=False, purge=False)[source]¶

Launch multiple instances of DSS at the same time, at different cores.

launchers.method_classic module¶

Created on 22 de Out de 2013

@author: julio

Basic command line interface for launching homogenization method as of Costa, C. (2008). It uses geostatistical simulation approach with classic DSS.

launchers.method_classic.ask_add_header(pset)[source]¶

Ask for the header when a point-set does not have any.

launchers.method_classic.ask_format(way)[source]¶

Asks for input/output file format. input: 1 or True output: 0 or False

launchers.method_classic.ask_save_vars(pset)[source]¶

Asks which variables should be written in the output file.

launchers.method_classic.ask_stations_method(pset, header=True)[source]¶

Asks which method will be used to select candidate stations.

launchers.method_classic.batch_networks(par_path, networks, decades=False)[source]¶

Batch process to run gscimcli at different networks.
